g.text: Look up solutions on a particular website (please list below)

text.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 16px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;

g.text: Look up solutions generally on the internet (Google)

text.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 16px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;

g.text: Ask a friend or colleague to help me

text.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 16px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;

g.text: Look up solutions in the scientific literature

text.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 16px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre; opacity: 1;

g.text: Sit down with a tool I know and start playing with the data

text.style: font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 22px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 19px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; font-weight: normal; white-space: pre;
